definition: concerned

to hang or suspend (from a hook etc)/to hang up (the phone)/(of a line) to be dead/to be worried or concerned/to make a phone call (dialect)/to register or record/classifier for sets or clusters of objects/(slang) to kill/to die/to be finished/to fail (an exam)

to read/to study (a subject)/to attend (a school)/to read aloud/to give (sb) a tongue-lashing (CL:頓|顿[dun4])/to miss (sb)/idea/remembrance/twenty (banker's anti-fraud numeral corresponding to 廿[nian4])
variant of 念[nian4], to read aloud

sentences.english: The continuous rain , recmy missing for you.
sentences.chinese: 绵亘不断的细雨，勾起我对你的挂念。

sentences.english: I don't really miss anything though, except family and friends, of course.
sentences.chinese: 那里没有任何东西令我挂念，当然家人和朋友除外。

sentences.english: Doth God take care for oxen?
sentences.chinese: 难道神所挂念的是牛么？

sentences.english: He missed his father; he longed for his mother.
Thanks brother's concernment . I'm fine and begin to clear up the things on hand today.
sentences.chinese: 谢老弟挂念，没事了，今天又开始整理手上的东西了。

sentences.english: Maybe you're still hung up on your ex-wife.
sentences.chinese: 也许你心里还挂念着你前妻呢。

sentences.english: He is one of the players after the World Cup I thought about a lot.
sentences.chinese: 我是世界杯之后我经常挂念的球员之一。

sentences.english: Worry is the warning light that God has been shoved to the sideline.
sentences.chinese: 挂念是一个警讯，显示神已被推到一旁。

sentences.english: She was somewhat concerned about Constance.
sentences.chinese: 她多少还有点挂念康斯坦斯。

sentences.english: Make an “I was thinking of you” phone call.
sentences.chinese: 打一个“我在挂念你”的电话。

sentences.english: Steamed stuffed bun to eat, is concerned with hiccups in the prison of BF.
sentences.chinese: 包子吃到打嗝，心里还挂念着那个在牢里的BF。

sentences.english: Maybe you're still hung up on your ex - wife.
sentences.chinese: 也许你心里还挂念着你前妻呢。

sentences.english: Admire flowers always miss a set, but I dont know how to find him.
sentences.chinese: 羡花一直挂念着日华，但不知如何找到他。

sentences.english: Our thoughts and prayers go out to the lion of the Senate.
sentences.chinese: 让我们向议会的雄狮表达挂念和祈祷。

sentences.english: Concerning almost thus the his majesty and empress is really the error of Yan Qing.
sentences.chinese: 令陛下和娘娘如此挂念，真是颜卿的过失。

definition: to constantly have (sb or sth) on one's mind
to worry about/to be concerned about
to worry/to be on one's mind
concerned/troubled/having sth on one's mind
to miss/to remember with longing/to long to see again

safe and sound/well
